content: Hi all! Wanted to quickly say hi to everyone, I'm Jason and I starting using Rust a few months ago. Currently I've only worked on some small personal projects, but I wanted to try some bigger projects and what better way to do that than working on the compiler (and all the tools around it). I'm currently also doing a Master's programme focused on programming technology, so it's kinda in character. I already started working on regex support for test filters, and I am looking forward to talking to some of you!
